Detailed Description

SPI Hardware Configuartion Structure.

Field Documentation

Mcspi_ConfigChfmt HWConfigData::configChfmt[MCSPI_MAX_CHAN_SUPPORTED]

Data Format Configuration values

UInt16 HWConfigData::fifoRxTrigLvl

This can be used to configure MCSPIXFERLEVEL[AFL] - buffer almost full register

UInt16 HWConfigData::fifoTxTrigLvl

This can be used to configure MCSPIXFERLEVEL[AEL] - buffer almost empty register

Int32 HWConfigData::masterOrSlave

Mcspi_CommMode 0 - Master Mode, 1 - Slave Mode

Int32 HWConfigData::pinOpModes

Mcspi_PinOpMode Only used in the single channel master mode. Only 4 - pin mode is being used.

Int32 HWConfigData::singleOrMultiChEnable

Mcspi_ChannelMode Only used in the Master mode
